text: Glenn Edward McDuffie (May 31, 1927 - March 9, 2014) was an American retired World War II soldier. He was known for being the subject of Alfred Eisenstaedt's photograph V-J Day in Times Square. He was kissing nurse Edith Shain because World War II ended. McDuffie was born in Kannapolis, North Carolina. He died on March 9, 2014 in Dallas, Texas from a heart attack, aged 86. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American people of World War II Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:People from Kannapolis, North Carolina Category:American sailors
title: Glenn McDuffie
